member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA
member.summary: The OUTLINETEXTMETRIC structure contains metrics describing a TrueType font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the OUTLINETEXTMETRIC structure.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmTextMetrics
member.summary: A structure containing further information about the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmFiller
member.summary: A value that causes the structure to be byte-aligned.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmPanoseNumber
member.summary: The PANOSE number for this font.

summary.para: The nature of the font pattern. This member can be a combination of the following bits.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmfsType
member.summary: Indicates whether the font is licensed. Licensed fonts must not be modified or exchanged. If bit 1 is set, the font may not be embedded in a document. If bit 1 is clear, the font can be embedded. If bit 2 is set, the embedding is read-only.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsCharSlopeRise
member.summary: The slope of the cursor. This value is 1 if the slope is vertical. Applications can use this value and the value of the otmsCharSlopeRun member to create an italic cursor that has the same slope as the main italic angle (specified by the otmItalicAngle member).

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsCharSlopeRun
member.summary: The slope of the cursor. This value is zero if the slope is vertical. Applications can use this value and the value of the otmsCharSlopeRise member to create an italic cursor that has the same slope as the main italic angle (specified by the otmItalicAngle member).

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmItalicAngle
member.summary: The main italic angle of the font, in tenths of a degree counterclockwise from vertical. Regular (roman) fonts have a value of zero. Italic fonts typically have a negative italic angle (that is, they lean to the right).

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmEMSquare
member.summary: The number of logical units defining the x- or y-dimension of the em square for this font. (The number of units in the x- and y-directions are always the same for an em square.)

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmAscent
member.summary: The maximum distance characters in this font extend above the base line. This is the typographic ascent for the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmDescent
member.summary: The maximum distance characters in this font extend below the base line. This is the typographic descent for the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmLineGap
member.summary: The typographic line spacing.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsCapEmHeight
member.summary: Not supported.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsXHeight
member.summary: Not supported.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmrcFontBox
member.summary: The bounding box for the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmMacAscent
member.summary: The maximum distance characters in this font extend above the base line for the Macintosh computer.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmMacDescent
member.summary: The maximum distance characters in this font extend below the base line for the Macintosh computer.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmMacLineGap
member.summary: The line-spacing information for the Macintosh computer.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmusMinimumPPEM
member.summary: The smallest recommended size for this font, in pixels per em-square.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmptSubscriptSize
member.summary: The recommended horizontal and vertical size for subscripts in this font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmptSubscriptOffset
member.summary: The recommended horizontal and vertical offset for subscripts in this font. The subscript offset is measured from the character origin to the origin of the subscript character.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmptSuperscriptSize
member.summary: The recommended horizontal and vertical size for superscripts in this font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmptSuperscriptOffset
member.summary: The recommended horizontal and vertical offset for superscripts in this font. The superscript offset is measured from the character base line to the base line of the superscript character.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsStrikeoutSize
member.summary: The width of the strikeout stroke for this font. Typically, this is the width of the em dash for the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsStrikeoutPosition
member.summary: The position of the strikeout stroke relative to the base line for this font. Positive values are above the base line and negative values are below.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsUnderscoreSize
member.summary: The thickness of the underscore character for this font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsUnderscorePosition
member.summary: The position of the underscore character for this font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmpFamilyName
member.summary: The offset from the beginning of the structure to a string specifying the family name for the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmpFaceName
member.summary: The offset from the beginning of the structure to a string specifying the typeface name for the font. (This typeface name corresponds to the name specified in the structure.)

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmpStyleName
member.summary: The offset from the beginning of the structure to a string specifying the style name for the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmpFullName
member.summary: The offset from the beginning of the structure to a string specifying the full name for the font. This name is unique for the font and often contains a version number or other identifying information.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA
member.summary: The OUTLINETEXTMETRIC structure contains metrics describing a TrueType font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmSize
member.summary: The size, in bytes, of the OUTLINETEXTMETRIC structure.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmTextMetrics
member.summary: A structure containing further information about the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmFiller
member.summary: A value that causes the structure to be byte-aligned.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmPanoseNumber
member.summary: The PANOSE number for this font.

summary.para: The nature of the font pattern. This member can be a combination of the following bits.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmfsType
member.summary: Indicates whether the font is licensed. Licensed fonts must not be modified or exchanged. If bit 1 is set, the font may not be embedded in a document. If bit 1 is clear, the font can be embedded. If bit 2 is set, the embedding is read-only.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsCharSlopeRise
member.summary: The slope of the cursor. This value is 1 if the slope is vertical. Applications can use this value and the value of the otmsCharSlopeRun member to create an italic cursor that has the same slope as the main italic angle (specified by the otmItalicAngle member).

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsCharSlopeRun
member.summary: The slope of the cursor. This value is zero if the slope is vertical. Applications can use this value and the value of the otmsCharSlopeRise member to create an italic cursor that has the same slope as the main italic angle (specified by the otmItalicAngle member).

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmItalicAngle
member.summary: The main italic angle of the font, in tenths of a degree counterclockwise from vertical. Regular (roman) fonts have a value of zero. Italic fonts typically have a negative italic angle (that is, they lean to the right).

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmEMSquare
member.summary: The number of logical units defining the x- or y-dimension of the em square for this font. (The number of units in the x- and y-directions are always the same for an em square.)

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmAscent
member.summary: The maximum distance characters in this font extend above the base line. This is the typographic ascent for the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmDescent
member.summary: The maximum distance characters in this font extend below the base line. This is the typographic descent for the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmLineGap
member.summary: The typographic line spacing.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsCapEmHeight

member.summary: Not supported.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmrcFontBox
member.summary: The bounding box for the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmMacAscent
member.summary: The maximum distance characters in this font extend above the base line for the Macintosh computer.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmMacDescent

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmMacLineGap
member.summary: The line-spacing information for the Macintosh computer.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmusMinimumPPEM
member.summary: The smallest recommended size for this font, in pixels per em-square.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmptSubscriptSize
member.summary: The recommended horizontal and vertical size for subscripts in this font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmptSubscriptOffset
member.summary: The recommended horizontal and vertical offset for subscripts in this font. The subscript offset is measured from the character origin to the origin of the subscript character.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmptSuperscriptSize
member.summary: The recommended horizontal and vertical size for superscripts in this font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmptSuperscriptOffset
member.summary: The recommended horizontal and vertical offset for superscripts in this font. The superscript offset is measured from the character base line to the base line of the superscript character.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsStrikeoutSize
member.summary: The width of the strikeout stroke for this font. Typically, this is the width of the em dash for the font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsStrikeoutPosition
member.summary: The position of the strikeout stroke relative to the base line for this font. Positive values are above the base line and negative values are below.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsUnderscoreSize
member.summary: The thickness of the underscore character for this font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmsUnderscorePosition
member.summary: The position of the underscore character for this font.

member.name: OUTLINETEXTMETRICA.otmpFamilyName
member.summary: The offset from the beginning of the structure to a string specifying the family name for the font.

member.summary: The offset from the beginning of the structure to a string specifying the typeface name for the font. (This typeface name corresponds to the name specified in the structure.)
